title: RGD for $4.95
author: VD
content_html: If you were interested in picking up a copy of The Return of the Great Depression but hadn’t gotten around to it for one reason or another, WND is offering it for only $4.95 today. A hardcover for what used to be a paperback price, not a bad deal.
content_text:
If you were interested in picking up a copy of
The Return of the Great Depression
but hadn’t gotten around to it for one reason or another, WND is offering it for
only $4.95 today
.  A hardcover for what used to be a paperback price, not a bad deal.
